body:
The old dislin tar.gz file dislin-11.0.linux.i586_64.tar.gz was removed from the directory ftp://ftp.gwdg.de/pub/grafik/dislin/linux/i586_64/, so I tried `spack checksum dislin` and `spack -k checksum dislin`to add the new version, (the new one is still in the same directory) but I got
```
==> Error: Could not find any versions for dislin
``` 

The weird thing is that after I manually add the new version with the hash, then `spack install dislin` works. And still 'spack checksum' cannot find anything.
title: checksum does not work while install works for dislin
